# Care Economy Time-Use Analysis

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)

data <- read.csv("sample data/timeuse_sample.csv")

data_clean <- data %>%
  filter(!is.na(gender), !is.na(paid_work_hrs), !is.na(unpaid_care_hrs), !is.na(rest_hrs))

long_data <- data_clean %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c("paid_work_hrs", "unpaid_care_hrs", "rest_hrs"),
               names_to = "activity",
               values_to = "hours")

summary_table <- long_data %>%
  group_by(gender, activity) %>%
  summarise(mean_hours = mean(hours), .groups = "drop")

ggplot(summary_table, aes(x = activity, y = mean_hours, fill = gender)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Average Time Use by Gender")
```
